title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 115.4 - Criminal case dispositions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 115.4 - Criminal case dispositions

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements of section
115.2
of this Part, each court
having jurisdiction over the processing or disposition of criminal actions
shall report case activity and disposition information with respect to each
criminal action, on a form prescribed pursuant to section
115.1
of this Part, or by
electronic media in a manner prescribed by the Chief Administrator. All such
information shall be reported within 24 hours following the occurrence of the
event if reported by electronic media, or within 48 hours if reported by
form. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
115.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
